extensionDescription.message: An add-on allowing the customization of Firefox windows' titles.

OG_currentWindow.description: Option group name for current window's settings

OG_existingWindows.description: Option group name for existing window's settings

OG_defaultWindows.description: Option group name for default window's settings

OG_separator.description: Option group name for separator settings

O_windowName.description: Label of the window's name input

OG_currentProfile.description: Option group name for profile's settings

O_profileName.description: Label of the profile's name input

O_titlePattern.description: Label of the title's pattern input

O_preview.description: Label of the preview for default window's titles

B_useCurrentPatternAsDefault.description: Button label to use current window's pattern as default pattern

B_applyCurPatternToExisting.message: Apply current pattern to open windows
B_applyCurPatternToExisting.description: Button label for applying current window's pattern to existing windows

B_applyDefPatternToExisting.message: Apply default pattern to open windows
B_applyDefPatternToExisting.description: Button label for applying default pattern to existing windows
